functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Burial Urn\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Undead remains are potent","color":"gray"}','{"text":"materials for complex castings, but","color":"gray"}','{"text":"those with lingering Kshji and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"curses can present exotic options","color":"gray"}','{"text":"for armour reinforcement.","color":"gray"}']}}
